name: Connect Four
description: Most of my memories of playing Connect Four are from playing at my Grandparents house as a child. They had a yellow version I remember very clearly. I decided to got for a bit of a retro feel and spent some time looking for the right fonts and colors. I worked out a console view as well, so make sure to open up dev tools and have a look. You can save and load your game to local storage to keep those winning streaks going.

name: Kitty Carousel
